posts.post_content:
The highest grade that PSA has given to any T213-1 HOFer is a 3.  There are 2 Benders, 2 Marquards and 1 Huggins hands at mouth all graded a 3.  There is a little wrinkle/crease to the left of his head that my scanner didn't pick up for some reason.  Let me know if you'd like pictures and I can take some next time I visit my bank box.

$7500 obo --------------->BIG PRICE DROP TO $5000
